meanings.definition: A tropical tree or shrub with fragrant flowers.
meanings.sent1: The frangipanis in the garden smell lovely.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bouquet of frangipanis for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzz happily around the frangipanis.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the sweet scent of frangipanis.
meanings.sent5: The frangipanis bloomed in vibrant colors under the sun.

meanings.definition: The fragrant flowers of the frangipani tree.
meanings.sent1: The frangipanis are white and yellow.
meanings.sent2: She wore a frangipanis hair clip to the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat napped peacefully under the frangipanis.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as soothing as the scent of frangipanis.
meanings.sent5: The frangipanis swayed gently in the breeze.
